title: [KAIST SoC Colloquium]From SLAM to Spatial AI
content: title:[KAIST SoC Colloquium]From SLAM to Spatial AI date:2024-03-11T00:00:00Z link:https://cs.kaist.ac.kr/board/view?bbs_id=events&bbs_sn=11038&page=1&skey=&svalue=&menu=86 content:Speaker: Andrew Davison ( Imperial College London / Professor) Title: From SLAM to Spatial AI Time: 17:00 , March 11, 2024 Online Link: https://kaist.zoom.us/j/84101178320?pwd=QnRFVURYbTNNbFZ2ejBTRlB0NzNHdz09 - ID: 841 0117 8320 - PW: 150691 Language: English Here is the speaker's biography. Bio I hold the position of Professor of Robot Vision at the Department of Computing, Imperial College London, and lead the Dyson Robotics Laboratory at Imperial College where we are working on vision and AI technology for next generation home robotics. I also lead the Robot Vision Research Group though most of my activity is now within the Dyson Lab. If you want more information about the colloquium, please refer to the colloquium page: https://cs.kaist.ac.kr/colloquium/ . location: 온라인 tag:csweb.calendar
